Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that is healthy because it has enough water and light.
The student can draw a plant that is not healthy because it lacks water.
The student can draw a plant that is not healthy because it lacks light.
The student can organize their drawings in a way that shows the difference between plants with and without water and light.
The student can identify and label patterns in their drawings, showing that plants need light and water to live and grow.
